いいから: (いいから) - listen up (used at start of command sentences for emphasis)
いいぞ: (いいぞ) - way to go!; attaboy!; hear, hear!
いいとこ: (いいところ) - good thing/strong point; good family/prestigious school; the right moment; utter/extreme; at (the) best/at most
いいとこのお坊ちゃん: (いいとこのおぼっちゃん) - rich kid; person who grew up wealthy
いいとこの坊ちゃん: (いいとこのぼっちゃん) - rich kid; person who grew up wealthy
いいところ: (いいところ) - good thing/strong point; good family/prestigious school; the right moment; utter/extreme; at (the) best/at most
いいとこ取り: (いいとこどり) - focusing on only the good points or strong points; incorporating the benefits (while ignoring the drawbacks); picking the best of both (everything); cherry-picking (e.g. information)
いいとも: (いいとも) - damn straight; no problem; sounds good; sure thing
いいようにする: (いいようにする) - to do as one wishes; to act as one wills
いい事: (いいこと) - good thing/nice thing; (usu. as 〜をいいことに(して)) good excuse/good grounds/good opportunity; interjection used to impress an idea or to urge a response
いい交わす: (いいかわす) - to have a chat with; to exchange words or promises; to promise; to get engaged
いい仲: (いいなか) - love for one another
いい加減: (iikagen) - irresponsável, superficial, descuidado; morno, meia-boca, sem entusiasmo, vago; razoável, moderado; consideravelmente, bastante, relativamente, bem
いい加減にしなさい: (いいかげんにしなさい) - shape up!; act properly!
いい加減にしろ: (いいかげんにしろ) - that's enough!; cut it out!; get a life!
いい加減にする: (いいかげんにする) - to put an end to something; to get something over with; to quit something one has been engaged in too long or to an excessive degree
いい勝負: (いいしょうぶ) - equal match; good match; fair match
いい子いい子: (いいこいいこ) - (from saying it as one strokes the child)  patting (pet or child, etc.); stroking
いい子になる: (いいこになる) - to make oneself popular without any regard to others; to take all the credit to oneself
いい子ぶる: (いいこぶる) - to act the goody-goody; to pretend to be nice
いい年して: (いいとしして) - (in spite of) being old enough to know better
いい年をして: (いいとしをして) - (in spite of) being old enough to know better
いい度胸: (いいどきょう) - some nerve (as in 'you must have some nerve to ...')
いい後は悪い: (いいあとはわるい) - after the good comes the bad
いい感じ: (いいかんじ) - pleasant feeling; good vibes
いい所のお坊ちゃん: (いいとこのおぼっちゃん) - rich kid; person who grew up wealthy
いい所の坊ちゃん: (いいとこのぼっちゃん) - rich kid; person who grew up wealthy
いい気になる: (いいきになる) - to be self-complacent; to be conceited; to flatter oneself; to be full of oneself
いい気味: (いいきび) - it serves you (him) right; it's what you (he) deserves
いい線: (いいせん) - more or less right; you are on the right track; getting warm
いい線いってる: (いいせんいってる) - to be on the right track; to be close enough
いい線を行く: (いいせんをいく) - to be on the right track; to go well
いい線行く: (いいせんいく) - to be on the right track; to go well
いい線行ってる: (いいせんいってる) - to be on the right track; to be close enough
いい薬になる: (いいくすりになる) - to learn a lesson (usu. from an unpleasant experience); to be good for someone
いい話: (いいはなし) - good story (e.g. heartwarming); good prospect (e.g. marriage, business)
いい迷惑: (いいめいわく) - (the いい is ironic) real nuisance; becoming inconvenienced by someone else's problems (through no fault of one's own)
いい頃: (いいころ) - high time; about time
いい顔: (いいかお) - big-shot/influential person; happy face/smiling face; sympathetic attitude
いい鴨: (いいカモ) - desirable prey; easy game; easy mark; easy prey; easy target
いかいか: (いかいか) - (イガイガ, いがいが only)  bur (of a chestnut, etc.)/burr; (イガイガ, いがいが only) irritating (e.g. one's throat)/thorny/bristling; crying of a baby
いかがお過ごしですか: (いかがおすごしですか) - How are things with you?; How are you doing?
いかさま裁判: (いかさまさいばん) - fake trial; kangaroo court
いかす: (いかす) - to be smart; to be cool; to be sharp; to be stylish
いかなる場合でも: (いかなるばあいでも) - in any case; whatever the case may be
いかり氷: (いかりこおり) - anchor ice; bottom-fast ice
いかれぽんち: (いかれぽんち) - airhead (of a male); ditz
いかれる: (いかれる) - to be beaten/to break down; to be crazy/to be touched; to be infatuated with; to be outdone (by someone)/to be beaten (in a contest)
いか物: (いかもの) - (also written 偽物)  fake/forgery/counterfeit/imitation; unusual item/something strange
いがいが: (いかいか) - (イガイガ, いがいが only)  bur (of a chestnut, etc.)/burr; (イガイガ, いがいが only) irritating (e.g. one's throat)/thorny/bristling; crying of a baby
いがみ合う: (いがみあう) - to snarl; to quarrel
いきり立つ: (いきりたつ) - to get angry; to lose one's temper
いくつかの理由から: (いくつかのりゆうから) - for whatever reason
いくない: (いくない) - (joc) (incorrect conjugation of 良い)  not good; bad
いくら何でも: (いくらなんでも) - no matter how you put it; whatever the circumstances may be; say what you like; no matter how you look at it
いく日: (いくにち) - how many days?; what day (of month)?
いく日か: (いくにちか) - some days; several days
いく日もいく日も: (いくにちもいくにちも) - day after day; for many days
いく種類: (いくしゅるい) - several kinds of; several varieties of
いけ: (いっけ) - prefix used to strengthen a derogatory adjective
いけぞんざい: (いけぞんざい) - rude; careless; slovenly
いける口: (いけるくち) - drinker; person who can hold their drink
いけん: (いけん) - (also 中国 dial.)  wrong/not good/of no use; hopeless/past hope; must not do
いけ図図しい: (いけずうずうしい) - impudent; shameless
いけ好かない: (いけすかない) - nasty; disgusting; disagreeable; creepy
いけ年: (いけどし) - old enough (to know better, etc.)
いけ面: (イケメン) - good-looking guy; handsome man; hunk; Adonis; cool guy
いごっそう: (いごっそう) - stubborn person; strong-minded person; obstinate person
いさぎ良い: (いさぎよい) - manly/sportsmanlike/gracious/gallant/resolute/brave; pure (heart, actions, etc.)/upright/blameless; unsullied (e.g. scenery or object)/pure/clean
いささ小笹: (いささおざさ) - short bamboo; small bamboo
いざこざ: (いざこざ) - trouble; quarrel; difficulties; complication; tangle
いざさらば: (いざさらば) - well then, (shall we)/well then, (I'll); goodbye
いざという時: (いざというとき) - when it's important; when it comes to the crunch; when push comes to shove; when it comes to the point; in one's hour of need; at the critical moment
いざとなったら: (いざとなると) - when push comes to shove; when needed; when necessity arises; when the moment arrives
いざとなると: (いざとなると) - when push comes to shove; when needed; when necessity arises; when the moment arrives
いざとなれば: (いざとなると) - when push comes to shove; when needed; when necessity arises; when the moment arrives
いざと言う時: (いざというとき) - when it's important; when it comes to the crunch; when push comes to shove; when it comes to the point; in one's hour of need; at the critical moment
いざなぎ景気: (いざなぎけいき) - Izanagi economic boom (1965-70) of Japan
いざなみ景気: (いざなみけいき) - period of Japanese economic expansion from February 2002 to October 2007
いざ知らず: (いざしらず) - I don't know about ... but; it may be possible for ... but
